message: I'm feeling generous, but I'm sure you understand the value of money.  Let's split it 90/10.  Accept and we're done!
Let's be fair,  I'll take a slightly larger share this time, but we both get a good chunk of the money.  Accept and we can move on.
I'm willing to be flexible, but I'm not giving up much more.  This is my final offer - take it or we both lose more money in the next round!
